body_html:
@smessmer after the jenkins update is done, you can rebuild the docker with the following steps:

(1) go to https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/caffe2-docker-trigger/
(2) make sure you are logged into jenkins.
(3) click "build with parameters"
(4) for git commit, use "origin/pr/6195/head" - replace with your own pr number.
body_text:
@smessmer after the jenkins update is done, you can rebuild the docker with the following steps:
(1) go to https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/caffe2-docker-trigger/
(2) make sure you are logged into jenkins.
(3) click "build with parameters"
(4) for git commit, use "origin/pr/6195/head" - replace with your own pr number.
body:
@smessmer after the jenkins update is done, you can rebuild the docker with the following steps:

(1) go to https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/caffe2-docker-trigger/
(2) make sure you are logged into jenkins.
(3) click "build with parameters"
(4) for git commit, use "origin/pr/6195/head" - replace with your own pr number.
